title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.4 - Content of project proposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 391.4 - Content of project proposal

State Regulations

The proposal must include the following information, as
further detailed in the request for proposals issued by the
commissioner: (a) name and address of
the applicant; (b) type of project
proposed; (c) estimated project
duration, total cost of project, grant funds requested and total applicant
match; (d) project details
including sufficient information to evaluate the project against the selection
criteria; and
(e) such other
information as the commissioner deems appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
391.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
